Based on OHP rules, please count your household members. Your household includes: • You (the person applying) • Your legal spouse • Your live-in partner (only if you have a child under 19 together) • Children (under age 19) who live with you • Anyone else you include on your federal income tax return (even if they don't live with you) • If you are under 19, include your parents, step-parents, and any brothers or sisters (under age 19) who live with you • If someone is pregnant in your household, count them and each expected baby

To help coordinate your services (like rent and utilities), we use a secure technology platform (called a Community Information Exchange, or CIE) to share information with Trillium and other partners. You have the right to opt-out of this.

Do you agree to let us use this technology to share your data for service coordination?

Yes, I agree to share my data using this technology.
No, I do not agree. (I want to opt-out)

IMPORTANT: Please read about timelines.

HRSN housing benefits are not guaranteed to prevent eviction. It can take 2-6 weeks to process payments after receival of bills and/or ledger. We cannot guarantee payment by a certain date. We will work as fast as we can, but you should also seek other housing support while we process your request.

web_form_fields.label: Zero Income Self-Certification
web_form_fields.options:
I certify that for the past 30 days, neither I nor any adult member of my household has received income from:

  • Employment (full-time, part-time, temporary, or self-employment)
  • Unemployment benefits, Social Security, disability benefits, pensions, or retirement accounts
  • Child support, spousal support, or regular cash support from family or friends
  • Rental income, investments, or any other ongoing source of income

web_form_fields.label: Authorization to Use and Disclose Protected Health Information
web_form_fields.options:
Authorization to Use and Disclose Protected Health Information

Please review this information carefully before signing.

1. Persons/Entities Authorized to Use and Receive My Personal Health Information

I authorize the mutual exchange of information between:

  • Just Compassion of East Washington County
  • Any subcontracted or affiliated program staff supporting housing, health, and social service coordination for the organizations listed above

This authorization applies to all staff, representatives, and authorized agents of the above entities, as needed for my services.

2. Type of Information to Be Released and Its Use

I permit the release and receipt of the following personal health and related information to and from the persons/entities listed above for the purpose of care coordination, housing support, service eligibility, and related benefit and support services:

  • Explanation of Benefits (EOBs)
  • Housing history and homelessness verification (for example: HMIS data, shelter stays, third-party verification)
  • Rent payment history and lease information
  • Income verification and financial assistance documentation
  • Physical health diagnoses relevant to housing needs
  • Communication with landlords and property managers related to housing retention
  • Legal documents relevant to tenancy (for example: eviction notices, reasonable accommodation requests)
  • Other information relevant to the coordination and delivery of housing, health, or supportive services under the SHS program

This includes information that may be shared both to and from Just Compassion of East Washington County and the parties listed above, as needed to coordinate tenancy, payment arrangements, eviction prevention, and other housing stability services.

3. Purpose of This Authorization

The information obtained with this authorization will be used only for the purpose of:

  • Housing stability support
  • Care coordination
  • Eligibility verification
  • Benefit and support service access

This includes a two-way exchange of information necessary to help ensure stable housing and appropriate support services.

web_form_fields.label: Other Authorized Party
web_form_fields.placeholder: Name/Address/Phone of any other person authorized to exchange info (optional).
